imInfiniteScroll
directive in module intermesh.infinite-scroll

Description

Scroll an element infinitely

Usage

as attribute
<ANY im-infinite-scroll="{function}"
     [im-infinite-scroll-disabled="{expression}"]
     [im-infinite-scroll-use-document-body="{boolean}"]>
   ...
</ANY>

Parameters

ParamTypeDetails
imInfiniteScrollfunction

function that should be called to load more items

imInfiniteScrollDisabled
(optional)
expression

Expression that returns true or false to disable scrolling. Useful for pending AJAX requests.

imInfiniteScrollUseDocumentBody
(optional)
boolean

By default the element is used for scroll detection. You can set this to true to use the document body.

Example
